bridgeTransferFrom(address,address,addre.details: Callback for `IKyberBridge`. Tries to buy `amount` of      `toTokenAddress` tokens by selling the entirety of the opposing asset      to the `KyberNetworkProxy` contract, then transfers the bought      tokens to `to`.

params.amount: Minimum amount of `toTokenAddress` tokens to buy.
params.to: The recipient of the bought tokens.

bridgeTransferFrom(address,address,addre.return: success The magic bytes if successful.

isValidSignature(bytes32,bytes).details: `SignatureType.Wallet` callback, so that this bridge can be the maker      and sign for itself in orders. Always succeeds.
